metadata.title: USN-3032-1 -- eCryptfs vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that eCryptfs incorrectly configured the encrypted swap partition for certain drive types. An attacker could use this issue to discover sensitive information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3032-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  ecryptfs-utils - 111-0ubuntu1.1 python-ecryptfs - 111-0ubuntu1.1 libecryptfs1 - 111-0ubuntu1.1 libecryptfs-dev - 111-0ubuntu1.1 No subscription required
